params.text: Eggaali ya Ckaku
Chaku yayagala okuzannya ne mikwano gye.
Chaku yayagala eggaali ya Lili.
Chaku yasalawo okwekolera eggaali ye.
Chaku yanoonya enduli z’emiti.
Chaku era yajjukira nti yeetaaga emisumaali n’ennyondo.
Chaku yagenda ewa kojja we okufuna obuyambi.
Kojja wa Chaku yamuwa ebikozesebwa. N’amugamba abeere mwegendereza.
Chaku yalowooza ku ngeri y’okukolamu eggaali ye.
Chaku yatandika okukola eggaali.
Eggaali yali nnungi nnyo! Wabula ng’eriko obuzibu.
Lili yalaba ekizibu kya Chaku. N’asalawo okumuyamba.
Nga bali wamu, baakola eggaali eŋŋumu.
Chaku yavuga eggaali ye buli we yagendanga.
Naye yanyumirwanga nnyo mu kaseera nga avugira kumu ne Lili.

“Eggaali ya Ckaku” credits
This work, “Eggaali ya Ckaku” is a derivative of Chaku's Cycleis translated byAlisha Berger. The © for this translation lies with Room to Read, 2016. Some rights reserved. Released under CC BY 4.0 license.Based on Original story:'Baiskeli ya Chaku', byUpendo Maria. © Room to Read , 2016. Some rights reserved.
